titleStmt.title: Part of the harmony of King Dauids harp Conteining the first XXI. Psalmes of King Dauid. Briefly & learnedly expounded by the Reuerend D. Victorinus Strigelius Professor of Diuinitie in the Vniuersity of Lypsia in Germanie. Newly translated into English by Rich. Robinson. Briefe contentes of these 21. Psalmes. ...
Hypomnēmata in omnes Psalmos Davidis. Psalm 1-21. English
titleStmt.author: Strigel, Victorinus, 1524-1569.
Robinson, Richard, citizen of London.

notesStmt.note: A translation of Psalms 1-21 of: Hypomnēmata in omnes Psalmos Davidis.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
